UPLOAD_SHARE_MSG: Share your files from your personal space.
UPLOAD_GROUP_MSG: Upload some files within the sharespace to collaborate with your team.
UPLOAD_REQUEST_MSG: Invite external co-workers to share their files within your personal space.
MY_FILES_SPACE_MSG: View  all your hosted files from your personal space.
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to LinShare, THE Secure, Open-Source File Sharing Tool.
